channel.title: Primal 2h (b)
channel.description: i really need help i got a source and p2h (b)=1h and its stance is like a 2h sword but its 1handed how can i make the 2h like a 1handed stance i dont know alot so please explain good thanks.

item.title: Primal 2h (b)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’re trying to make a 2h into a 1h, I assume? I believe you can change the walk/stand/attack anims to 1-handed stances in ItemAssistant.java (Assuming you’re on a PI). There is also usually some form of a boolean or similar that checks for names/ids of weapons to make them return as a 2 handed weapon, and it probably looks for “primal 2h” so I would look for that as well.

Read full topic
